fr.eve.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.eve.client.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    The Client class is used to manage Eve clients.

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String ip,
                    int port)
             throws java.net.MalformedURLException,
                    java.rmi.RemoteException,
                    java.rmi.NotBoundException,
                    AlreadyConnectedException,
                    java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException
        Connection to a server.
        Parameters:
        name - - Server name.
        ip - - Server ip.
        port - - Server port.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - if name is not currently bound.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if the name is not an appropriately formatted URL.
        AlreadyConnectedException - if the user is already connected to the network.
        java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException - if no remote method invocation is being processed in the current thread.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Initial file.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.
        NotConnectedException - if you are not connected to the network yet. Call the connect method first.

      • notifyEvent

        public void notifyEvent(java.lang.String event)
                 throws NotConnectedException,
                        java.rmi.RemoteException,
                        java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException
        Notify the server of an event.
        Parameters:
        event - - Event to notify.
        Throws:
        NotConnectedException - if you are not connected to the network yet. Call the connect method first.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the registry could not be exported or contacted.
        java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException - if no remote method invocation is being processed in the current thread.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
                throws NotConnectedException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException,
                       AlreadyDisconnectedException
        Disconnection from the server.
        Throws:
        NotConnectedException - if you are not connected to the network yet. Call the connect method first.
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        java.rmi.server.ServerNotActiveException - if no remote method invocation is being processed in the current thread.
        AlreadyDisconnectedException - if the user is already disconnected from the network.
